cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 4.0 FATAL_ERROR)


include(FetchContent)


add_library(Dependencies INTERFACE)

#=================================================Options
option(DEPENDENCIES_BUILD_TEST          ""      NOT)
option(DEPENDENCIES_BUILD_STATIC_LIBS   ""      TRUE)


option(DEPENDENCIES_BUILD_ERROR         ""      NOT)



option(INCLUDE_VULKAN                   ""      TRUE)
option(INCLUDE_GLM                      ""      TRUE)

#==========================GLM_MATH_LIBRARY
#url: https://github.com/g-truc/glm.git

if(INCLUDE_GLM)
    find_package(GLM REQUIRED)
    if(GLM_FOUND STREQUAL TRUE)
        message(STATUS "GLM_IS_FOUND")
        target_include_directories(Dependencies INTERFACE GLM_INCLUDE_PATH)
        target_link_libraries(Dependencies INTERFACE GLM_LIBRARIES)
    else()
        message(STATUS "GLM_IS_NOT_FOUND")
        FetchContent_Declare(
          glm
          GIT_REPOSITORY https://github.com/g-truc/glm.git
          GIT_TAG 1.0.1
        )
        FetchContent_MakeAvailable(glm)
        target_link_libraries(Dependencies INTERFACE glm::glm)
    endif(GLM_FOUND STREQUAL TRUE)
endif(INCLUDE_GLM)
